website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling guinea pig food that is highly nutritious and appealing to most pets. Chances are one of the brand's specialized diets will fit your pet's needs.
pros: Top-quality ingredients including fiber-rich grass hay make these pellets nutritious and highly-digestible
Contains an appropriate balance of vitamin C and protein to promote health
Available in different varieties, including young, adult, and organic recipes
cons: Some picky pigs may not like it, but most are attracted to the flavor
A few customers received ripped bags or product that seemed stale

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food for the hungry piggies!
customer_reviews.text: Our fat boys love this food and give it however many thumbs they have up. Actually that is not true. Their first love is salad, which they will pretend they have never eaten and whine for 30 seconds after they finish it, followed by hay (just the flowers, please, the rest can will just be scattered everywhere), and then this food if there is absolutely nothing else to eat. That said, this is supposed to be the best, and Larry and Gilly deserve it because they do such a good job at...well...whatever it is that Guinea Pigs do. Looking cute and making silly noises.
customer_reviews.author: Vapid

customer_reviews.title: Cavy and vet approved
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food i will feed my cavies because it doesn't have alfalfa in it. I have an American Guinea pig and a Cuy and they both love this food. It's not full of the unhealthy multi-colored additives that other foods have that aren't healthy for your piggies. My vet recommended only Timothy pellets especially for my cuy to keep him healthy and at an appropriate weight so this does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: K. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The Best Food on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my boys, they were eating some colorful mix filled with nutritionally poor "treats." I quickly switched them over to this food - and they love it! Not only do they wheek at me for their daily meal, but they eat it quickly and happily. This is the best (and healthiest) food you can get on the market for the price they ask - and if you follow the feeding recommendation (1/8th cup per piggy, unlimited hay supply with daily veggies) then this bag will last you for quite a while as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Best kibble for adult guinea pigs - don't get fooled by "pretty" bright colored bits and bobs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only kibble-type food we will feed to our guinea pigs - we have eight, rescued from various bad situations. I really appreciate that it's based on timothy hay rather than alfalfa - guinea pigs love alfalfa but it's not always best for them due to the extra calcium. Oxbow doesn't use any of those brightly colored bits, which are basically just filler. It's plain-looking kibble, no exciting bright orange bits or dried fruit nummies, but it's the best nutrition for guinea pigs at a great price. Sixteen little guinea pig "thumbs" up!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Clouser

customer_reviews.title: Piggies Have Spoken
customer_reviews.text: Update: Not sure if something changed in the ingredients, but I'm starting to have a hard time getting my piggies to eat this. My hopes still lay with this as a good source, I'm hoping it's just that they are just being bratty. Will update again if there is progress UPDATE: My piggies still freakin loves it. Keep up the good work! Wow, never have I ever seen my piggies run so fast to get food. It has a good smell and they definitely loved it. So glad, now they'll be able to eat more of their pellets and have a better balanced diet.
customer_reviews.author: Liah05Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great, Healthy Pellets for Your ADULT Guinea Pig
customer_reviews.text: OXBOW is a great company listing that these pellets are for ADULT Guinea Pigs.(older than 6 months) The reason is that these great pellets have Timothy Hay and do not contain Alfalfa which is not good for Adult cavies. Many companies put alfalfa in their feed and treats and this causes their teeth to overgrow. My guinea pigs love these pellets. Know that this formula is full of vitamins that they need.
customer_reviews.author: soph98

customer_reviews.title: Wrong food.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered ADULT guinea pig food. As you can see on the white sticker, it says "adult". I just happen to look at the back of the bag this morning and realized it said "young". I quickly realized that they stuck the sticker over the young labeling on the front and actually sent this bag. I have been feeding my adult pig this food for the last week, which contains alfalfa. Definitely NOT pleased right now.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: My vet recommended this food for my guinea pigs and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this food for my guinea pigs and it is the only pellet that I'll feed them. It's very high quality and doesn't have the junk ingredients that other guinea pig foods have. It's significantly more expensive than other brands when you buy it in the 5 and 10 lb sizes, so I was very happy when I saw that I could now purchase the food in a 25lb size. It is a great price on Amazon and makes the food much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: AAG

customer_reviews.title: Natural food for piggies :)
customer_reviews.text: I love that there's a natural food for guinea pigs on the market! I want to give them five stars for that alone, however, my three girls were not interested in this food. I mixed it with their usual food, and have gone back and forth between giving them foods that were just pellets and foods that had dried fruit pieces/other things in it, so I know they will eat plain pellet food, but this food did not go over well. I'm honestly not sure why they wouldn't eat it, but I'm going to continue mixing it with a company I know they like until they finish the bag. I still recommend Oxbow though! :P
customer_reviews.author: My Kids Have Fur, Feathers or Scales.

customer_reviews.title: Always Go With Oxbow!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same bag of pellets about 5 times since I have had my guinea pigs. The only time I ever had an issue was when I received a damaged bag that was torn but Amazon CS dealt with that quite quickly. As far as I, and most of the guinea pig owning community is concerned, this is the only pellet worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Stable price for your Miss Piggy, too!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the guinea pig food I was getting for our Miss Piggy at the pet store except that their prices skyrocketed in the last month. It increased by $10 a bag, I was all like WhhA-A-A-A-A-At? This is the food that provides our Miss Piggy with the nourishment she needs. We give her lots of other stuff of course, but that is just for her entertainment and to bribe the little thing to like us better. As long as she gets the Oxbow food, I know she will be all right.
customer_reviews.author: Trouble

customer_reviews.title: Best guinea pig food on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've tried buying (and my guinea pig has tried eating) various brands, and we are both convinced that this is the best pellet food on the market. It has exactly what she needs without all of that extra artificial coloring or random things that aren't good for them. A bit pricey, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hope4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is great food! I think my guineas seem happier when they are on it. It did take some adjustment for me at first not seeing those colorful little add-ins that most foods have, but my veterinarian recommended this brand to me when my poor first guinea pig was suffering from severe vitamin c deficiency. She ate the food and seemed to improve in health a little. They use a stabilized form that makes it actually last long enough to get into your piggy's belly, which is great for piece of mind. It's also one of the only brands I have found that sells in bulk, which is a huge bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this product. It's our piggy's favorite and all we buy them and I was quite excited to get it at such a discount. I worried about why it might be discounted, but after reading some reviews on them having plenty of time left on the "use by" dates, I placed my order. It arrived today and the expiration was Feb. 2016!! 😞 So disappointing to receive something already expired!
customer_reviews.author: Shannaher

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price just go to the stores!
customer_reviews.text: This was so expensive! I had really unhealthy pellets and wanted to switch, a lot of people recommend this to me. I like to order online so thought I could order this, WRONG. It is around $17. In the stores it is around $10, I have now switched mine to Kaytee normal timothy hay pellets!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Leyvas

customer_reviews.title: Good pig food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only guinea pig food we buy for our boys. We found that this is the cheapest place to buy it when you include shipping and purchase minimums. One bag lasts our two guys quite a while and they love it just the same from the time it's first opened until the bag runs out. Good quality stuff.
customer_reviews.author: ABuc5224

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Piggies are happy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand my guinea pigs would eat. Very nice and fresh. I was worried that they won't like it at the end of the bag, but they still happily eating them fine. Overall, great quality products and happy piggies. Will and had brought again! You probably want to keep an eye on this product, coz once awhile price would drop, then is a good time to buy. If not, is still cheaper than buying individual smaller bags.
customer_reviews.author: Wen.C

customer_reviews.title: Best Pellets for Pigs
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig Pooh Bear eats his Oxbow pellets every day. I've tried blended pellet options with seeds and other bits but most pigs selectively eat only what they like, leaving most of the food behind. With Oxbow pellets I know my pig is getting a high quality pellet with the nutrients he needs (like vitamin C) but not any of the wasteful extras.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roche

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pig approved
customer_reviews.text: My pigs give this a paws up. They definitely prefer the flavor of this vs the cheap stuff they were getting. They started picking these out of the bowl and leaving their old pellets during the "transition" so I just did a full on switch without any issues. It gives me peace of mind knowing they're getting the nutrition they need without so many fillers.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great pellets, and quick shipping.
customer_reviews.text: We adopted 2 piggies that we’re neglected in the past. They’re super skiddish, but the minute I open this food they start squeaking and stand up waiting for it. They love it, and I love that they’re getting healthy pellets now. Great price for a huge bag, and it always ships so quick, even quicker than a few prime items I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell W

customer_reviews.title: This is good food it's the best
customer_reviews.text: This is good food it's the best. Other foods they will dump the bowl of food on the floor as soon as i give them it. This they are excited to get and they actually eat the food instead of dumping it out. 02/2016 UPDATE : They still eat it. Amazon price is too high at $45 I used to get the 10lb bags on amazon for less than $15. One time I ordered 4 ten lb bags for less than $12 each so i've gotten 40lbs for what just the 25lb costs now. I was able to order the 25lb elsewhere for 35$
customer_reviews.author: white rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Trust No Other
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake and bought a cheaper brand. My guinea pigs made a mess with it and it turned to powder all over their fleece cage lining. They seemed to only play with it. I ordered more Oxbow food and they’re happy once more. They eat every crumb and it doesn’t have time to spill out all over their cage.
customer_reviews.author: FencePpl

customer_reviews.title: The Best Food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best guinea pig food! About a week and a half after switching from a store brand to Oxbow I noticed that my guinea pigs all had sleek, healthier looking coats. They also got shiny eyes and generally look so much happier. I've always bought store brand foods, or Kaytee brand in the past without thinking there was much difference. I'm glad we tried Oxbow. My piggies love it! Definitely worth the extra money for high quality food if you can afford it. And the 10 lb bag on Amazon is cheaper than buying Oxbow in pet stores around me!
customer_reviews.author: Amy K. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Piggies love these pellets!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs love these pellets and I love the quality, size, and price! I haven't been able to find this product in packages this large anywhere else at this price point. This is the only pellet I feel good about feeding to my piggies and they love them as well. They are always munching them down!
customer_reviews.author: Serinda Wallace

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pigs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been feeding this to my guinea pigs since they were babies and are now about 2 1/2 yrs old. They're both very healthy boys and they love these pellets. The price is also amazing for the amount of food you get and it's delivered fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jewelle T.

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs didn’t eat some brands but they really like this one. Actually I thought they eat more than before just not sure if they become old or they just like this new food. :)
customer_reviews.author: Yusyu

customer_reviews.title: Picky pigs only eat Oxbow
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pellet-based food my guinea pigs will touch. It's definitely pricier than the other major pet store brands, but if you skim the back labels of each, you're getting a terrific nutritional bang for your buck! It smells fresh--not sickly sweet-- and my piggies pretty much snub any other pellet now. If you have picky pigs, this might just be the best for you, too!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: My favorite food to buy
customer_reviews.text: This is my preferred food for my piggies. I find they always eat it. IT is pricier than others for sure, but I think the quality is higher. Also it is what my vet recommends for the piggies.
customer_reviews.author: The Cubicle Escapee

customer_reviews.title: Quality feed, price a little high
customer_reviews.text: The only feed I use and have used for all my small pets for the past 6+ years. You pay a bit more for the convenience of fast shipping so if you can wait a few days it's cheaper to order at a different dealer not located on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Picky piggies pick around pellets
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too crazy about these pellets. Firstly, I thought it was actually Timothy hay grass, not pellets but that's my error. Secondly, my piggies just don't seem to like it. I've had to mix it with another brand but even then they seem to nudge out these pellets and go for the other brand. Not sure why as the pellets are a healthy dark green and not broken pieces. Smells fresh as well. But, 3 stars because my girls aren't really a fan. Otherwise good seems decent.
customer_reviews.author: Kara l. Taiclet

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding Cavy Cuisine since I got my guys boys (didn't get them when they were young enough to need the alfalfa feed) and am very happy with it. There have been not issues with the calcium used in the product, which is the only negative thing I have really ever heard about this brand. The bag arrived quickly and pellets are fresh smelling. I put about two weeks worth into a smaller container and keep this (HUGE) bag sealed and put away. Saves me time and money buying this way, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: BuysTooMuchTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Pigs like it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in a 5 gallon bucket. I was buying 50lbs of King Lifelong Combo (another excellent piggie food) at half the price but the last bag became contaminated with bugs. Came back to Oxbow for now.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for adult guineas
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this product for years for my adult guinea pigs. It was actually veterinarian-recommended as the best food for guineas. I've been buying it for stores for 20+ years but just recently discovered it was available through Amazon - cheaper and more convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: My vet was very pleased when I told her the food I feed my little guinea pig. This is high quality food. When I unzip the bag to fill her little bowl, she gets very excited. She can smell it before I even add it to her bowl! I highly recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McClain

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad packaging for shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good product but my bag came with a knife cut on the bag that leaked some product into shipping box and opened bag up do not as fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Masterfulrose

customer_reviews.title: Transitioning from Young Pellets to Adults
customer_reviews.text: We just transitioned the piggies from Oxbow Young Pellets to these adult pellets, and we've had no issues! Our Oxbow pellets always arrive timely and are fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The Piggies love it
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say much more than the title, but my two adult females love it. It’s also Timothy based, rather than alfalfa, so since they are adults, it should help them maintain a healthy weight, in conjunction with reasonable amounts of fresh vegetables and unlimited Timothy Hay.
customer_reviews.author: Shellz & AJ

customer_reviews.title: Came spilled all over the box
customer_reviews.text: I've used this food before and my guinea pigs like it just fine and thought I'd try ordering it because of quarantine, unfortunately it came spilled all over the box and I'm not even sure if I should feet it to them because of this
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this multiple times for my 6 year old guinea pig. He always likes the greens better than the pellets but out of all the pellets i have bought him in this past he tends to like this brand the most. He is getting old but this has kept him healthy, it doesn't have extra junk in it he doesn't need.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great pellets
customer_reviews.text: Our guinea pigs love this food. They squeal like crazy when they hear the bag, and devour it so quick. You can see the quality in these pellets. We won’t use anything else. The shipping was super quick, just as fast as prime.
customer_reviews.author: Rachell W

customer_reviews.title: My Guinea Pig Really Likes it
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea Pig really likes it. He was not eating much of another food brand but he is now eating well. We are very happy with this brand. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Manny Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money. Buying this 25 pound bag is a huge savings when you spend $20 or more for a 10 pound bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Mariol

customer_reviews.title: My piggies love them and ask for them.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly sure how they taste, but my piggies love them! Therefore, my assumption is they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I think this is the best food for my piggies
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the best food for my piggies! My late piggie TaeTae LOVED this food and he was a picky eater. Another thing i've noticed about this food is that it has a good scent. With other g-pig foods i've always noticed an artificial smell that was kind of off putting. But with oxbow, when I open it, I can smell the veggies and it smells very natural. I think oxbow is one of the few companies i trust with my piggies nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs absolutely love this food, and it's great knowing that it's also healthy & nutritious. No added junk. Definitely a great product. PS They ship super fast! Second time ordering off of Amazon, and couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: My piggies were on the chunky side so the vet at the university vet teaching hospital said to use oxbow I'd fed it to them as babies they loved it then and they love it now I can get bigger bags here than the pet store
customer_reviews.author: Ali Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: Another great Oxbow purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super quick, packaged well and fresh. No store packaging. My guinea pigs are happy as always.
customer_reviews.author: Jm Harmon

customer_reviews.title: best pellets out there, recommended
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves these pellets, it may not be her first choice of what to eat (compared to romaine lettuce, carrots, cilantro, or other foods) but the dish is almost always empty in the morning. I've had a total of four pigs and they've all eaten these pellets once they were adults.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Best guinea pig food around!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old guinea pig and want to give her the best that is out there. She has always loved this brand of food and will keep buying this. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Yerger

customer_reviews.title: The Only Food for My Piggies
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food that I feel comfortable feeding my guinea pigs. They can be picky and this gives them the taste they want at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food
customer_reviews.text: I can't really speak to the freshness or flavor and my Cavy can't speak English.... But she definitely eats this with everything else, and I like the quality of the ingredient list!
customer_reviews.author: Soshan

customer_reviews.title: Good for my cavie and makes me happy to see him eat it!
customer_reviews.text: Cavie loves it. So happy to give it to him. PetCo talked me into trying another brand. He ate a little. Then no go. Oxbow products rock!
customer_reviews.author: Guinea pig lover

customer_reviews.title: Best Guinea Pig Pellets
customer_reviews.text: It is the highest rated guinea pig food and my piggies like it. When their pellet dish is empty, they turn it upside down, so I will notice.
customer_reviews.author: budgiehawk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I feed Oxbow foods to my Guinea pigs, but I also use their mouse and young rat food as well as the adult rat food for my rats and mouse. They make the best foods for your small pets. They love it and with Oxbow, I can trust my little ones are getting what they need to thrive.
customer_reviews.author: Angelis

customer_reviews.title: piggie approved
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 little piggies like Oxbow much more than the colorful junk with all the chemicals!! Their bodies are so little and lives so short to start with, I want to keep as many chemicals out of their diet as possible. Oxbow has much better ingredients, and the ladies notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: SMGross

customer_reviews.title: Has molasses
customer_reviews.text: I am no longer getting Oxbow because molasses is not good for guinea pigs. Oxbow was a trustworthy brand but it seems their quality is lacking. I ordered from Sherwood this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: This is the best commercially available guinea pig food
customer_reviews.text: This is the best commercially available guinea pig food. There is maybe one better but that is only available from the one source. and I wonder if it's really all that better to have Amazon convenience. My Peruvian guinea pig is going 8 and lives the stuff... I supplement with Oxbow Timothy hey.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: Favorite brand for my guinea pig hay. Have bought several bags over the years and this has been the best
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Oxbow has unhealthy, cheap fillers :(
customer_reviews.text: I’m not very never happy with the fact that all their products have molasses, wheat and corn in them... unnecessary & unhealthy FILLERS. C’mon Oxbow.. change the formula to be healthier!
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: Only pellets they'll eat
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of picky guinea pigs and since they were started out on this brand it's the only pellets they'll eat and I've tried to switch them to a different brand and they won't eat it. So ya a 5 star for my piggies.
customer_reviews.author: denton girl

customer_reviews.title: A Surprize a mistake can turn into a GOOD THING!
customer_reviews.text: Will I ordered this item by MISTAKE . I’m sorry but it seems my girls seem to like it!it was a great price, I think I have enough for QUIT A WHILE.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Fonger

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs love.
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 guinea pigs go nuts for this food and it always seems to be cheaper on Amazon than it does at the pet store. I appreciate being able to get this when I want it and with covid not having to leave my house to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen A

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Switched to this because it's better for my piggies than what the person before me was feeding them. They love it and didn't mind the switch at all. Good ingredients and I like that it's only timothy hay based, no alfalfa.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that these pellets have vitamin C in them that shortens the amount of vitamin C I give them...the 5lbs for one guinea pig lasts for about a month. This was my first time buying the 10 lbs one and for thE price I'll keep buying the 10 lbs because in the pet stores is more expensive. And since I have 3 guinea pigs it's runs out very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Samanta

customer_reviews.title: I read a few reviews before deciding on this one and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig loves these. She would never eat them when they came in the so-called Guinea pig healthy mixes from petsmart. I read a few reviews before deciding on this one and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for piggies health
customer_reviews.text: This is a well formulated pellet for for guinea pigs, though the size and shape of the pellets make my guinea pigs not want to eat it for some reason. I had switched to this because I found stuff like pretzels and seeds in the other guinea pig food I had been buying - and looked up that those were not good for pigs(well, obviously not the pretzels....that made me look for new food) and found this one. I just wish the size of the pellets were bigger or more varied so my guinea pigs would like it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Oxbow Cavy Cuisine. I used to buy our food at a local pet supply chain, but they don't carry this brand. Oxbow is highly recommended due to it's superior nutritional formula. Unfortunately, many commercially available brands use alfalfa as the base ingredient for their pellets which is contraindicated for Adult Guinea Pigs due to it's high calcium content. Oxbow uses timothy hay, which is the best choice nutritionally. I love buying Oxbow on Amazon because I get a superior product for a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: The rescue recommended this food and the piggies sure do like it
customer_reviews.text: The rescue recommended this food and the piggies sure do like it. From what I have researched & read this is a very good GP food and it does not contain all the junk & dyed rainbow mystery things lesser quality foods do. This will have them wheeking & popcorning!
customer_reviews.author: Heartwings

customer_reviews.title: however I am not happy that it has Soy
customer_reviews.text: Used Oxbow brand pellets for years, however I am not happy that it has Soy, Wheat & Molasses in it. Those are unnecessary & very unhealthy fillers that cause health issues! Shame on you Oxbow for adding in unhealthy and unnecessary fillers.
customer_reviews.author: ART

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best guinea pig food on the market. This food has vitamin c added and is only a pellet food which cuts down on your piggies just picking out the "good stuff" that they like and then not eating the healthy stuff. It also makes their coats a lot softer with the special blend Oxbow has created to make sure your guinea pigs stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Liesl

customer_reviews.title: Piggy’s approves!
customer_reviews.text: My guys love this food it’s the best brand! Got all vitamins all in it and nice fine pellets! Great trusted brand too!
customer_reviews.author: Missy!

customer_reviews.title: My Guinea Pig loves it
customer_reviews.text: I do not really know how to rate this product, I only know that my Guinea Pig does not leave it in the bowl very long. I pair it up with Timothy Hay and he goes for the pellets first.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids' guinea pig loves this. None of the filler seed that she would just spill everywhere. A little less than 1/8th a cup a day is what she consumes, so this bag, while expensive, will last forever with us!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Marie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great feed, great seller
customer_reviews.text: Superior cavy feed, highly recommended. Seller ships quickly and feed is always fresh and well-packed. Have bought several times with no issues. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Perplexer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs loves this food and has always done well on it. She came from a situation where she was neglected and fed a poor diet. Since being switched over to Oxbow she looks better, her coat and skin looks healthy, she has more energy, she's happier and she maintains a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia DeBoe

customer_reviews.title: they love it. it's not too broken up either
customer_reviews.text: the only food i've bought for my guinea pigs. they love it. it's not too broken up either. i was a little worried about the shipping process breaking up pieces and my pigs getting all the dust but I was glad that wasn't an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize it had so many unnecessary ingredients. My pig was back to his normal ...
customer_reviews.text: Kaytee brand was making my pig sick. (wet-mushy poos). Didn't realize it had so many unnecessary ingredients. My pig was back to his normal self within just a couple of days after giving him this brand instead. The difference between the two brands is night and day. Kaytee was light and dry looking; while Oxbow is a nice deep-dark green color. Take it from me, ingredients do matter. I'm going to be trying out their Gerbil food next, for my other little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: If you want the best for your pet.....
customer_reviews.text: When pets are like family members, you want nothing but the best for them. I did extensive research before choosing this brand of Guinea pig food and have not been disappointed. Our little girls love this food and they are very healthy and happy. This particular size bag lasts us almost 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: The best guinea pig food hands down
customer_reviews.text: The best guinea pig food hands down! This is the only thing I feed my piggies. There are no other fruit pieces or anything for them to get all picky and they love it! Plus I trust oxbow with all my guinea pig food/treats. Cause they are the best at what they do.
customer_reviews.author: Liesl

customer_reviews.title: My pig loves these pellets!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig absolutely loves these pellets (although he's not really a picky eater so I'm not sure if that is saying much). He has been eating them for the past 4 years. I have read that these are the best pellets for providing a balanced diet. This is a really large bag and lasts for a long time. To keep it fresh and dry, I pour some out into a sealable food container for daily access. The rest of the bag, I seal up and put into another ziplock bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Pig food
customer_reviews.text: How do I know what tastes good to Guinnea Pigs? They eat it so I guess it's ok. I buy it because it's an extremely great source of vitamin C which pigs need!
customer_reviews.author: E. Dlugosz Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my piggies. It’s cheaper than the stores!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig approved
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs cannot get enough of this product, they absolutely love it! Whenever they know I'm filling up the pellets they fight over who can get there first haha
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Smells fresh. Doesn’t have all the extra fillers (i.e. seeds, dried fruit, etc) that others do. This 5lb bag will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Dotson

customer_reviews.title: The only brand I trust.
customer_reviews.text: The only guinea pig food I trust. She loves it and this was a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My brand for my three guinea pigs. Coupons?
customer_reviews.text: My piggies love this and it’s healthy and ‘safe’. No seeds with shells. They choke!!!! Wish I could find coupons for this brand though.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I don’t think this is organic ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I really really wish they made this organic because pesticides are designed to kill rodents
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Quality food
customer_reviews.text: My two guinea pigs like this food above any of the others I have tried. They are pretty slow to go through a bag though. Better pricing on here than local pet food stores. The only concern is I have read this food had a higher calcium content and I do sometimes see some calcium deposits in their urine on the fleece bedding. Could be caused by other things though like romaine lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pigs love these pellets
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs love these pellets. I like knowing they are getting a healthy pellet that will give them the nutrients they need. The price is wonderful as well. Bag is resealable which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: Best food for guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: My girls absolutely love this food! It has pellets only and is the Oxbow brand which is recommended by veterinarians for guinea pigs. It is not the most inexpensive cavie food out there but if you would rather have healthier, happier guinea pigs this is great.
customer_reviews.author: tiller0323

customer_reviews.title: It's the only pellet food our guinea pigs will eat ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the only pellet food our guinea pigs will eat. We order it everytime they run out. And yes, they are picky eaters. We have tried different food prior to this one, and they would not touch it. They are spoiled guineas.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 female guinea pigs and they love this food. I’ve never had a issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna marie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good GP food. I bought the 10 pound bag by mistake (I usually buy 5 pounds) and boy, that is a lot of pellets. My only complaint is that the "zipper" closure doesn't work at all. Problem solved with a plastic container. FYI, I do bag up my pellets in qt plastic bags and freeze them to help prevent nutrient degradation.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Giant bag, great value
customer_reviews.text: Guides pigs enjoy it, bought huge bag so I wouldn’t need to go to pet store during pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Amalia Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pigs are in good health and definitely bigger than the average guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs refuse to eat any other type of guinea pig food. I have been buying this brand and type for years and I have never once had an issue with it personally. My guinea pigs are in good health and definitely bigger than the average guinea pig. It's a great choice. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality food
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent guinea pig food. It is important to buy timothy based pellets for adults and this is very hard to find. It also has added vitamin C and my girls love it. The 10 pound bag lasts about 3.5 months with my three girls
customer_reviews.author: 2thfairy30

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for pigs
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and this product is considered one of the best foods for guinea pigs. And they love it! Wheek wheek!
customer_reviews.author: DellaRF

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I tad expensive, but our GP, Phil loves it! I can't personally comment on the taste.
customer_reviews.author: backdoc

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Seal Fallen OFF! Do NOT Recommend :(
customer_reviews.text: The packages arrived with the fresh seal FALLEN OFF. If you want to store a 25lbs Guinea pig food for 2 piggies for more than 1+ month, I do NOT recommend buying, we are still wondering how we should store all those food that’s about to go bad :(
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great food!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of he most recommended brands for guinea pig food and buying in bulk gave me a great price. In order to keep the vitamin c from degrading I am storing the bag in my dark, cold basement and only bring up a small amount of feed at a time for the piggies.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

product_meta.title: Oxbow Essentials Adult Guinea Pig Food
product_meta.description: Size:5 lbOxbow's cavy Cuisine - adult guinea pig food is made from timothy grass meal, which includes the high fiber adult guinea pigs need. However, it contains a lower level of protein, calories and calcium than alfalfa-based pellets. Adult animals' digestive systems do not require the same level as that of younger animals. Cavy Cuisine - adult guinea pig contains stabilized vitamin C and an optimal calcium-to-phosphorus ratio that helps maintain a healthy body. When fed with oxbow grass hays and treats, cavy Cuisine - adult guinea pig provides complete stabilized nutrition.
feature_bullets: ESSENTIAL INGREDIENTS FOR A HEALTHY, ACTIVE LIFESTYLE: Made with high fiber Oxbow Timothy Hay to support healthy digestion
SUPPORTS IMMUNE SYSTEM HEALTH: Made with stabilized Vitamin C and antioxidants to support the immune system health of your guinea pig
PERFECT FOR PICKY EATERS: Uniform pellets prevent selective feeding
FORTIFIED FOOD: Fortified with vitamins and minerals for optimum health
VETERINARIAN RECOMMENDED: Formulated with the guidance of top veterinarians and nutritionists

FEEDING INSTRUCTIONS: Mature Guinea Pigs (over 6 months) Feed 1/8 cup pellets daily in addition to unlimited grass hay. Although Essentials - Adult Guinea Pig Food is an excellent complete feed for guinea pigs, unlimited access to fresh grass hay should also be provided.

COMPLEMENT BY ADDING OXBOW GRASS HAY: Offer unlimited amounts of fresh grass hay at all times. Choose from Oxbow’s Western Timothy, Orchard, Oat, Hay Blends, Organic Meadow, or Botanical grass hays to meet your pet's daily fiber needs.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
